Title: Diabetes and Alzheimer’s Disease: A Link not as Simple as it Seems
Abstract: © 2018, Springer Science+Business Media, LLC, part of Springer Nature.Type 2 diabetes mellitus is associated with an increased risk to develop Alzheimer disease, however, the underlying mechanisms for this association are still unclear. In this review we will provide a critical overview of the major findings coming from clinical studies and animal models.
